grouping-blurbs:long: Collections of “long” discourses and other related texts.
grouping-blurbs:medium: Collections of “middle-length” discourses and other related texts.
grouping-blurbs:linked: Collections of “linked” or “connected” discourses and other related texts.
grouping-blurbs:numbered: Collections of “numbered” or “numerical” discourses and other related texts.
grouping-blurbs:minor: Collections of sutta texts outside the four main collections.
grouping-blurbs:other: Texts that are similar to those in the previous five collections, but which are difficult to classify.
